thread.title: Daniel Craig won't say whether 'Spectre' is his 007 swansong
thread.title_full: Daniel Craig won't say whether 'Spectre' is his 007 swansong

author: senh
title: Daniel Craig won't say whether 'Spectre' is his 007 swansong
text: BING NEWS: Daniel Craig won't say whether 'Spectre' is his 007 swansong LONDON (AP) - Is "Spectre" Daniel Craig's Bond swansong? We'll have to wait and see. The British actor makes his fourth appearance as suave secret agent 007 in the Sam Mendes-directed film, which has its world premiere in London on Monday.
